description: If it survives the wave, it gains $1 mana based on the wave number and earns |img(icons/Gold.png) $2 per mana. If it dies, it loses half mana. Mana transfers when upgraded.
name: Compound Interest
tooltip: If it survives the wave, it gains 1-6 mana based on the wave number and earns <img class='tooltip-icon' src='hud/img/icons/Gold.png' /> 1 per mana. If it dies, it loses half mana. Mana transfers when upgraded.
